// import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const ProductDetails = ({ allProducts }) => { console.log(allProducts) return (

Name: {allProducts.name}

Price: ${allProducts.price}

Details: {allProducts.description}

{/*

Reviews: {props.reviews.content}

*/}
) } export default ProductDetails
